title: How to Make a Datareader Game

steps.headline: Create a document on the computer using Word or notepad.
Create a title such as - Deer Hunter 2 -, and what type of Datareader it supports.
Create data for your game:'
steps.description: Joe: Hey, welcome to Racer800 Joe: What's your name? Joe: Hey, "Name Here" Welcome to Racer800, select your car. ext...

steps.headline: Use personalization by putting "Name Here" in the text file.
Create missions and what not, by selecting different areas on the Datareader platform editor.
Once you have completed your game, check to see if your game is made for DR Universal or DR-3D.
steps.description: Other versions such as DR or DR II don't count here.

text: Create a document on the computer using Word or notepad.  Create a title such as - Deer Hunter 2 -, and what type of Datareader it supports. I.e Datareader 3d only Create data for your game:' Joe: Hey, welcome to Racer800 Joe: What's your name? Joe: Hey, "Name Here" Welcome to Racer800, select your car. ext... Use personalization by putting "Name Here" in the text file.  Create missions and what not, by selecting different areas on the Datareader platform editor. (wordpad) Once you have completed your game, check to see if your game is made for DR Universal or DR-3D. Other versions such as DR or DR II don't count here.
